Text: This is imho the best redbook CD.All other versions of this be it Vinyl-SACD etc have their place too.A classic mastering job.You've turned things around nicely and I certainly appreciate it as I'm sure others quietly agree.How can you not? Thank you for all your time and work sharing all these excellent uploads.I have the majority,but it's good of you to give others the chance to have them too.Thanks again.
